attributes.title: White Walker
attributes.actor: Ian WhyteA '''White Walker'''Â is an unnamed minor character in the Season 2

sections.Behind the Scenes: This White Walker was played by [[Ian Whyte]], who also played the [[White Walker (Winter is Coming)|White Walker]] in the series premiere, "[[Winter is Coming (episode)|Winter is Coming]]". There's no indication that they're meant to be the same White Walker, though it is possible. A [[White Walker (Oathkeeper)|different]] White Walker, played by [[Ross Mullan]], retrieved [[Craster's last son]] in [[Oathkeeper]], though again, it is possible that the same White Walker has been tasked with retrieving all Craster's sons.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
A White Walker retrieves a baby left in the [[Haunted Forest]] as a sacrifice by [[Craster]], a [[Free Folk|wildling]] that worships the White Walkers and sacrifices his male offspring to them. [[Jon Snow]] witnesses the incident and is quickly knocked out by Craster.<ref>"[[The Night Lands]]"</ref>
